title: Barely Remember Being Taken to ER
report: Three glasses of red wine before dinner. After dinner took two 10 mg (20 mg total) of Ambien. Rx prescribed by local MD for sleep disorder, but for 10mg only @ bedtime.
Barely remember being taken to the ER by my Son as he thought I was having a stroke. Barely remember tests (EKG, blood) administered by ER personnel.
Released after a lecture by ER MD...'read the label!'

erowid.citation: Dave Smith. "Barely Remember Being Taken to ER: experience with Zolpidem & Alcohol - Wine (ID 67413)". Erowid.org. Feb 6, 2008. erowid.org/exp/67413
